t: ‘Alexa, what do you know about us?’ What I discovered when I asked Amazon to tell me everything my family’s smart speaker had heard | Amazon Alexa | The Guardian
s: 3 days ago - Last year, I realised that my ... life moments. To see if I could distil anything of value – the contours of a 21st-century adulthood, perhaps – from all the information Amazon holds about me, I requested all the available data using an almost impossible to find link.
